Please do a video on dyslexia. Please explain how those 3 parts of the brain interpret reading, sounding out and recognizing a word happen for us. I'm a bit tired of people telling me they're dyslexic just because they stumble over some words when they're reading or worst telling me you think your 4yr child has it, because she can't get her shoes of the right feet. We don't see words backwards, we don't see the world as backward land. Everyone is different and manifest their dyslexia differently, it's not a "learning disability" we just learn different and a lot of us are very smart, and even score above average on over all grading test.
Please do this, people need help in understanding dyslexia so children can be thought and helped in creative ways, and don't fall through the cracks, like so many do.

Alcohol poisons the body by going into each cell and making your Peroxisomes focus on alcohol instead of the natural H202 ( Hydrogen Peroxide) which is a poison in your body. You sir need to be educated before you correct others, first of all, the hot glowing part of fire, is an object, it is a pocket of plasma, ionized gas. Second. fire is the result of rapid oxidation. Not the "excitement of particles", yes the particles are excited when you generate heat from the reaction, but that's not what the reaction is. And the "fuel being released (that) is glowing" is not fuel, it's the product of the chemical reaction. Fire does play a part in physics but it is an object.
